results.name: Number of triangles with integer sides and area = n times perimeter.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000 (first 300 terms from Zhining Yang)
Juan V. Savall and Jesus Ferrer, Problem E3408, Amer. Math. Monthly, 99 (1992), 175-176.
program: (PARI) for(k=1,100, n=0; d=4*k^2; e=3*d; for(b=1,sqrt(e), for(c=2*k,e/b, if(b*c>d && c>=b, f = (b + c)*d / (b * c - d); if(f>=c, a=floor(f); if(a==f, n++))))); print1(n, ", "))
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_
